meanings.sent1: The village was full of omadhauns who always made silly mistakes.
meanings.sent2: He was often teased for being one of the omadhauns in the group.
meanings.sent3: The omadhauns in the comedy show always brought laughter with their silly antics.
meanings.sent4: She felt like an omadhaun when she realized she had been using the wrong key all along.
meanings.sent5: The classroom was never boring with the omadhauns around, always making everyone laugh.

meanings.sent1: The omadhauns at the party were causing chaos with their reckless actions.
meanings.sent2: His omadhauns led to him failing the test, much to his disappointment.
meanings.sent3: The omadhauns of the group decided to have a dance-off in the middle of the street.
meanings.sent4: Ignoring the warning signs was an act of pure omadhauns.
meanings.sent5: The omadhauns of the town were known for their wild and unpredictable behavior.
